fort-wayne.neighborhoods: Downtown, West Central, North Anthony, Southwood, Bloomingdale, Aboite
fort-wayne.meetingHighlights: Active downtown and suburban meetings with strong newcomer support and diverse meeting formats.
fort-wayne.transitInfo: IPFW and local bus services; accessible via I-69 and regional highways; Fort Wayne International Airport for regional flights.

indianapolis.neighborhoods: Downtown, Broad Ripple, Fountain Square, Meridian-Kessler, Irvington, Mass Ave
indianapolis.meetingHighlights: Large, diverse meeting calendar across the city with many daytime, evening, and specialty meetings including Big Book and LGBTQ+ friendly groups.
indianapolis.transitInfo: IndyGo buses and Red Line rapid transit in core areas; Indianapolis International Airport (IND) serves national flights.

south-bend.neighborhoods: Downtown, Notre Dame area, Near West Side
south-bend.meetingHighlights: University-influenced meetings near Notre Dame and steady neighborhood meetings with evening and weekend options.
south-bend.transitInfo: Transpo buses in South Bend; regional Amtrak service and South Bend International Airport for regional flights.

evansville.neighborhoods: Downtown, West Side, Eastland, North Park
evansville.meetingHighlights: Strong faith-based meeting presence and regular downtown AA meetings with newcomer-friendly formats.
evansville.transitInfo: METS local buses; US-41 and I-69 provide regional driving access; Evansville Regional Airport for flights.

bloomington.neighborhoods: Downtown, Indiana University area, Near West Side
bloomington.meetingHighlights: University-area meetings with varied formats and strong lunchtime and evening groups serving students and residents.
bloomington.transitInfo: BT buses serve the city; close to Monroe County Airport for regional flights; easy highway access via IN-37.

lafayette.meetingHighlights: Meetings that serve both the Purdue community and local residents; a mix of step-study and open discussion groups.
lafayette.transitInfo: CityBus and Purdue Transit provide local transport; Purdue Airport and major highways (I-65 nearby).

gary.neighborhoods: Downtown, Miller Beach, Emerson, Glen Park
gary.meetingHighlights: Community-focused meetings with evening and weekend options; several downtown and neighborhood groups.
gary.transitInfo: Gary Public Transportation Corporation buses and South Shore Line commuter rail to Chicago; proximity to Gary/Chicago International Airport.
